Name: Tales of Adventure 2
About the game: Tales of Adventure 2 is a 2D shoot’em up with over 30 different stylistic levels and exciting mechanics. Defeat the enemy and gain power-up crystals to advance your stats and abilities. Loot the most exotic items to defeat the enemy! Features 30+ levels each with its unique mechanics. 40+ types of monsters with unique behaviors and attack animation. All monsters tell you a little about this new world; together, these pieces of information define this world. 12 tracks of BGM. Consuming power-up crystals will randomly boost your attributes. 8 types of spells. Upgrading spells also changes animation. When you upgrade your low level spells, there’s a chance you will discover a new spell! Items will periodically spawn in your screen, don’t miss them! Special effects from spells and items can stack. Find out the best combination to annihilate the enemy!
